name: Telegram Files Store Bot
description: A Telegram Files Store Bot in Pyrogram by @AbirHasan2005

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Your Bot Username which you sent to @BotFather (Without [@])

FORCESUB_CHANNEL.description: The Channel ID which will be used as Database. Example: -100123456789

BLACKLISTED_CHANNEL.description: MongoDB Database URI for Saving UserID for Broadcast.

CHANNEL_1.description: ID of a Channel which you want to do Force Sub to use the bot. Example: -100123456789

CHANNEL_2.description: Logs Channel ID for some Tracking XD. Example: -100123456789
